name: Gabriel does a thing
desc: My personal site, the one you're on right now, w/ a static blog, animations, modals, light & dark mode, and a live spotify status bar.

name: Sightsee
desc: Vacation site w/ followable holiday destinations, user authentication with JSON web tokens, and a protected route.

name: Urban Viking
desc: E-commerce fashion brand site w/ an advanced cart (editable, responsive, persistent), stripe checkout, and personally designed products.

name: Str Blog
desc: A community blog site, with firebase user authentication, user profile page, editable markdown posts w/ live view, image uploading via firebase storage.

name: Firestarter
desc: A kanban board w/ google and email authentication, drag & drop boards w/ color selection, responsive material design + an angular universal SSR demo.

name: Firemart
desc: Supermarket app, w/ user authentication, role authorization(admin) for CRUD operation + image uploading, real-time carts, and printable invoices.

name: Lena Ozer
desc: A personal brand and blog site w/ content management, built for my mom, with Next, Tailwind and Sanity.
